description.overview: Soldiers are the embodiment of military might on the battlefield, equipped with the knowledge and gear to engage in prolonged combat. They specialize in various weapons and are adept at creating strategic advantages through firepower and defensive tactics.

system.flashback_trigger: When the team is at risk of walking into an ambush or a strategically disadvantageous situation.
system.flashback_effect: The Soldier pauses the current scenario to reveal a flashback where they recognized signs of a potential ambush or trap ahead of time. They then took preventative measures, such as rerouting the team, setting up countermeasures, or neutralizing the threat in advance. The Soldier rolls to determine the success of these preparations in circumventing the ambush and securing a tactical advantage for the current situation.
system.signature_resource_desc: With each clash of steel and burst of gunfire, the Soldier’s unit and presence on the battlefield grows more formidable. Like a juggernaut gaining speed, their attacks become increasingly aggressive and precise. The sound of their gunfire and the rhythm of their movements resonate like a drumbeat of war, instilling fear in their enemies and rallying courage in their allies.
system.signature_resource_effect:
During a battle you accumulate Tension Points, each time you make a successful attack or generate Edge you gain a Tension point up to a maximum of 6.
You and your allies upgrade a number of dice equal to accumulated Tension points. Only dice tests made in combat on your turn get upgraded by tension points.

Reset: If you fail to deal damage with an attack or if you personally roll a Glitch, your Tension points are reset back to 0.

advancements.name: Attribute Improvement
advancements.effect: +1 to Chosen Attribute up to Breed maximum

advancements.name: Evade Close Combat
advancements.effect: +1 ER when targeted by Melee Attacks

advancements.name: Dodge Range
advancements.effect: +1 ER when targeted by Ranged Attacks

advancements.name: Duck Explosives
advancements.effect: +1 ER when targeted by an area of effect attack or explosion

advancements.name: Nano Resist
advancements.effect: +1 ER when targeted by a hostile nano program

advancements.name: Implant Treatment Conditioning
advancements.effect: +1 for Implant Surgery Tests and using Cybernetic Equipment

advancements.name: Computer Literacy
advancements.effect: +1 For checks interacting with computers and accessing the Grid

skill_list.name: Demolitionist
skill_list.description:
• Expertise in explosives and demolitions
  • Skilled in handling, deploying, and disarming various types of explosives.
  • Tactical use of demolitions for breaching, sabotage, or destroying structures.
  • Knowledge of explosive materials and their effective applications.

skill_list.name: Recon Ops
skill_list.description:
• Specialization in reconnaissance and intelligence gathering.
  • Conducting stealthy surveillance and information collection.
  • Knowledgeable of different vehicles and how to hijack or pilot them.
  • Skilled in stealth, camouflage, and low-visibility operations.

skill_list.name: Gunsmith
skill_list.description:
• Skill Focus: Mastery in firearm creation, maintenance, and modification.
  • Designing and crafting custom firearms.
  • Repairing and enhancing various types of guns.
  • Advanced knowledge of ballistics and ammunition.

skill_list.name: Tactician
skill_list.description:
• Strategic planning and tactical command.
  • Developing and implementing battle plans and strategies.
  • Analyzing enemy tactics to devise counterstrategies.
  • Coordinating teams and leading others.

skill_list.name: Survivor
skill_list.description:
• Survival skills in hostile environments.
  • Wilderness survival, including foraging, tracking, and sheltering.
  • Enduring extreme conditions and scenarios.
  • Mending and administering first-aid.

nanoprograms.name: Gazump Fight
nanoprograms.effect: Target + Hits deal +10 damage on their next attack.

nanoprograms.name: Helepolis of the Besieger
nanoprograms.effect: Snare yourself. Your attacks gain the Blast quality and you gain 5 DEF + Hits armor.

nanoprograms.name: Total Combat Survival
nanoprograms.effect: Target temporarily increases their maximum HP by 20, and gains 1+hits hp at the start of each turn.

nanoprograms.name: Remedy Inhibitor
nanoprograms.effect: Prevents target + hits from receiving the benefit of healing and regeneration.

nanoprograms.name: Unmistakable Victim
nanoprograms.effect: Target + Hits have Aggro towards you.

nanoprograms.name: Full Automatic Targeting
nanoprograms.effect: Reroll 1+hits number of dice in an attack test, keeping the better result.

nanoprograms.name: Art of War
nanoprograms.effect: Upgrades target + hits Ranged Loadout skill by +2

nanoprograms.name: Metal Barrage
nanoprograms.effect: AOE attack reducing enemy movement and attack speed.

nanoprograms.name: Pierce Nerves
nanoprograms.effect: Target gains 1+Hits penalty on melee attack rolls.

nanoprograms.name: Phalanx
nanoprograms.effect: You and Allies gain 1+Hits increased DEF and RES for each ally engaged with you for the duration of the program.

nanoprograms.name: Augmented Mirror Shield
nanoprograms.effect: Create a powerful shield that absorbs 5 x hits damage and returns it back to the attacker. This can only be used once every 2 minutes.

nanoprograms.name: Reactive Reflective Field
nanoprograms.effect: Grants a target a defensive barrier. Characters with the barrier absorb 2 x hits damage and returns it to the attacker.

signature_traits.name: Offensive Steamroller
signature_traits.description:
Mechanic: Employs the Power Die to gain more Initiative after each successful attack.

Function: As the Soldier successfully lands attacks, their momentum builds, represented by the Power Die incrementing. Each increase in the Power Die level grants additional Initiative, making the Soldier quicker and more aggressive in combat. Risk: As the Power Die level increases, the Soldier may become more vulnerable to counter-attacks or lose precision, representing the trade-off between aggression and control.
